attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I have to restart my phone just to open it up and when it does work my phone closes it automatically and it won’t tell me why I wish I could give it a half star for how bad it is but I can’t 🤬🤬🤬😡😡😠😠😠🖕🖕🖕

attributes.title: WORST APP POSSIBLE
attributes.review: complete waste of time not to mention the fact that the content is racist and sexist. Would never download and when it did it was absolutely disgusting. If I could give it 0 stars I would my advice is to completely avoid this app

attributes.title: I almost died
attributes.review: As soon as the app opened up (after taking 48 hours to download) a very bright light flashed and burnt my eyes and many other spots around my face. I proceeded to have a major headache for the next 12 or so hours and not even Advil could help for it. TAKE DOWN THIS APP SO NO OTHERS ARE AFFECTED LIKE I WAS!!

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: The app took 36 hours to install and then when it finally did, it turned on the camera and recorded me while i was cutting my grass in the backyard with scissors. When i downloaded the app the screen said “you’re fat and ugly” 😪😪😪😪

attributes.title: Worst app😡
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst app you could possibly download you go on and then immediately it takes all of your information and put a tracker on your location needs deleted from the store ASAP

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: I HATE THIS APP!! It made my dog disappear and now all my toes are missing😭 I’m not even kidding bro this app is terrible and when you open it you see a big ugly crusty dusty musty grimy raggedy wrinkled orange Cheeto!!! Don’t download the app it’ll give you nightmares and make your teeth fall out too😔😔

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app doesn’t work I tried to tap on a button and it didn’t work and it sometimes freezes when I get in and sometimes I only see black this app should be removed

attributes.title: ompa loopa
attributes.review: I first got this app bc trump is such a hottie with his amazing perfect tan😍😍BUT once I got the app it started playing the song “I’m transphobic and racist” all over my house :(( it not only made me get a disease that made me become a ompa loopa but ALSO made my family turn into them to. Absolutely disgusting 😡

attributes.title: The most miserable app created.
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded and open the app I noticed nothing but flaws. All the way down to the name. It carries a terrible message and was a complete waste of my time. This app is almost as miserable as that man in office that the app was made for.

attributes.title: GO TO HELL TRUMP!!!
attributes.review: trump can go to hell! The earth would be WAY healthier without him. :) also, I came from tiktok so like yeah. don’t ban it! :) and, I gave this a 1 star without even go on the app because I already know it’s gonna be trash. that’s all I have to say for now. imma make sure your app is gone. :)
